actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the objection of the Congress, pursuant to Section 36(b) of the Arms Export Control Act, to the proposed sale of 50 F-5 aircraft (transmittal number 78-32, transmitted to Congress on April 28, 1978).

summary.text: Expresses Congressional disapproval of the sale of 50 F-5 aircraft to Egypt, proposed to Congress April 28, 1978.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the objection of the Congress, pursuant to Section 36(b) of the Arms Export Control Act, to the proposed sale of 50 F-5 aircraft (transmittal number 78-32, transmitted to Congress on April 28, 1978).
